about_the_game:
The Visit is a psychological horror game developed and published by ZForward. It is an unsettling story of bravery, identity and what it means to be human.

Synopsis
The Visit puts you in control of Terry Mason, a strong minded tradesman who is vigorously a non believer when it comes to anything spiritual, after he agrees to a bet for $1,000 to stay in a haunted Manor House for 1 night, he sets off on a life changing event.

Gameplay
Explore the house and uncover the traumatising truth of the dark past of the grounds. Will you get to the bottom of it or will you perish. An alarming odyssey into the dark corners of the human mind awaits.

Do you have what it takes to survive?
